action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings to improve user experience.
notes: Focus on customizing the landing page and inbox for efficiency.

action_item: Users & Roles - Uncheck the legacy search box to enable advanced patient search features.
notes: This will allow searching by first name, last name, and gender.

action_item: Security - Change the main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Follow the straightforward process to update the password.

action_item: Security - Update the eSignature ID for document signing security.
notes: Ensure to validate current ID before creating a new one.

action_item: Security - Update the visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate eSignature ID before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize CCDA templates for clinical summaries.
notes: Select and order the sections of the patient's chart to include in summaries.
